ttp_template:
<group name="configured_mode_hw_mode_last_change_duration_local_role">
Redundancy Mode  : {{REDUNDANCY_MODE | ORPHRASE}}
Redundancy State  : {{LOCAL_ROLE | ORPHRASE}}
Redundancy State  : {{REDUNDANCY_STATE | ORPHRASE}}
Hardware Mode  : {{HW_MODE | ORPHRASE}}
Last Redundancy Mode Change  : {{LAST_CHANGE_DURATION | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Redundant System Information :
------------------------------
Redundancy Mode   : sso
Redundancy State  : Active
Redundancy State  : Standby
Hardware Mode     : Duplex
Software Mode     : sso
Standby Failures  : 0
Active Failures   : 0
=====

Configured Redundancy Mode     : sso
Operational Redundancy Mode    : sso
Last Redundancy Mode Change    : 00:23:15 ago
Switchovers since last reload  : 2

-----
Local System Status:  Active
Role Identifier       : Active
Peer Uptime           : 00:45:56
Active Time           : 02:15:42
Standby Failures      : 0
Hardware Mode         : Duplex
Software Mode         : sso
Peer Software Mode    : sso
Peer Role             : Standby

Peer System Status:  Standby
Role Identifier       : Standby
Uptime                : 00:45:56
Active Time           : 00:45:56
Standby Failures      : 0
Hardware Mode         : Duplex
Software Mode         : sso
Peer Software Mode    : sso
Peer Role             : Active

Active Role Status:
     In Sync  : Yes
     Groups   : 2


Standby Role Status:
     In Sync  : Yes
     Groups   : 2

Data Traffic Statistics:
------------------------
Lost Packets(HW)            : 0
Lost Packets(SW)            : 0
Packets Sent from Active    : 100
Packets Recieved on Standby : 90

-----

Peer State Changes:
Start Time            End Time              Change Reason
--------------------- --------------------- -------------------
02:00:22              02:05:44              Switchover
02:10:50              02:12:30              Manual Change
04:55:10              04:56:13              Switchover Initiated
textfsm_template:
Value REDUNDANCY_MODE (\w+)
Value REDUNDANCY_STATE (Active|Standby)
Value HW_MODE (\w+)
Value SW_MODE (\w+)
Value CONFIGURED_MODE (\w+)
Value OPERATIONAL_MODE (\w+)
Value LAST_CHANGE_DURATION (\d+:\d+:\d+ ago)
Value SWITCHOVERS (\d+)
Value LOCAL_ROLE (Active|Standby)
Value LOCAL_UPTIME (\S+)
Value LOCAL_ACTIVE_TIME (\S+)
Value PEER_ROLE (Active|Standby)
Value PEER_UPTIME (\S+)
Value PEER_ACTIVE_TIME (\S+)
Value IN_SYNC (\w+)

Start
 ^Redundancy Mode\s*:\s*${REDUNDANCY_MODE}\s*$$
 ^Redundancy State\s*:\s*${REDUNDANCY_STATE}\s*$$
 ^Hardware Mode\s*:\s*${HW_MODE}\s*$$
 ^Software Mode\s*:\s*${SW_MODE}\s*$$
 ^Configured Redundancy Mode\s*:\s*${CONFIGURED_MODE}\s*$$
 ^Operational Redundancy Mode\s*:\s*${OPERATIONAL_MODE}\s*$$
 ^Last Redundancy Mode Change\s*:\s*${LAST_CHANGE_DURATION}\s*$$
 ^Switchovers since last reload\s*:\s*${SWITCHOVERS}\s*$$
 ^Local System Status:\s*${LOCAL_ROLE}\s*$$
 ^\s+Role Identifier\s*:\s*${LOCAL_ROLE}\s*$$
 ^\s+Peer Uptime\s*:\s*${LOCAL_UPTIME}\s*$$
 ^\s+Active Time\s*:\s*${LOCAL_ACTIVE_TIME}\s*$$
 ^Peer System Status:\s*${PEER_ROLE}\s*$$
 ^\s+Role Identifier\s*:\s*${PEER_ROLE}\s*$$
 ^\s+Uptime\s*:\s*${PEER_UPTIME}\s*$$
 ^\s+Active Time\s*:\s*${PEER_ACTIVE_TIME}\s*$$
 ^In Sync\s*:\s*${IN_SYNC}\s*$$
